short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restores the 'Mute Tab' functionality of versions prior to Chrome 71.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome 71 removed the flag that enables per-tab audio muting. This extension allows you to mute individual tabs by a new context menu option or interacting with the extension icon.
